actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation, S. Rept. 96-801.

actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide that the shipping vessel Kailua have the right to engage in coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to document the vessel Kailua as a vessel owned by citizens of the United States with the privilege of engaging in coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the shipping vessel Kailua have the right to engage in coastwise trade.
